_A_LIST_COMPONENT_DESCRIPTION_: The AList component is a reusable list component that can accept an array of data and generate a list using a specified HTML tag. It also allows for custom configuration options, such as defining the CSS classes for the list and its items, setting custom label for items, and providing callback functions to define how the label is displayed.
_A_LIST_GROUP_CLASS_GROUP_DESCRIPTION_: pass the CSS class for the main list or for the element
_A_LIST_CLASS_MAIN_PROP_DESCRIPTION_: Class applied to the main list container
_A_LIST_CLASS_ITEM_PROP_DESCRIPTION_: Class applied to each list item
_A_LIST_KEY_LABEL_PROP_DESCRIPTION_: Property name in data object used for item label
_A_LIST_KEY_CHILDREN_PROP_DESCRIPTION_: Property name in data object used for child items
_A_LIST_TAG_PROP_DESCRIPTION_: HTML tag used for the list
_A_LIST_LABEL_TAG_PROP_DESCRIPTION_: HTML tag used for item label
_A_LIST_DATA_PROP_DESCRIPTION_: Array of data objects to be displayed as a list
_A_LIST_KEY_CHILDREN_DESCRIPTION_: The 'keyChildren' prop provides support for items to have their own child items, enabling hierarchical data representation.
_A_LIST_KEY_LABEL_CALLBACK_DESCRIPTION_: The 'keyLabelCallback' prop allows custom transformation of the item labels.
_A_LIST_TAG_LABEL_TAG_DESCRIPTION_: The 'tag' and 'labelTag' props customize the HTML tags used for the list structure and item labels.
_A_LIST_WITH_CHILDREN_DESCRIPTION_: A list with nested items, demonstrating hierarchy.
_A_LIST_WITHOUT_CHILDREN_DESCRIPTION_: A simple list without nested items.
_A_LIST_WITH_SLOT_DESCRIPTION_: A list with custom content in the items via slot.
